name: Hook Up: The Game
description:
Play as Alex, a sex positive twenty-something, by exploring her dating profile. Chat with her matches (including her ex-bully) to find out the truth about Alex and George. What happened in high school? Have they really changed since then? Will they or won’t they hook up?



*** A visual novel about sex, trauma, and online dating. ***



Features:
- Edit Alex’s profile
- Swipe on other characters
- Send messages to other profiles
- Send emojis to make choices within the story
- Watch flashbacks as Alex confronts her past


Content warning: This game contains themes of sex, abuse, and suicide. User discretion is advised. This game is not suitable for those under 16.


Assisted typing is available in the settings menu.


If you have any comments or feedback please contact us at info@hookupthegame.com .
